subject: Re: Running scripts in the Background...
body:
Steve Pittman wrote:
> I have a perl script that I want to leave running after I close my terminal session...it's a tcpip listener...
> 
> When i run the job in background mode and exit the term session...it terminates
> 
> Any thoughts?....thanks in advance..Steve!
> 
> $ killMsgRcv.pl 9997
> [Server killMsgRcv.pl accepting clients]
> ^Z[1] + Stopped (SIGTSTP)        killMsgRcv.pl 9997
> $ bg
> [1]     killMsgRcv.pl 9997&
> $ [Connect from .....]

man nohup
